ts_semantic_feature_detector.output_utils package

Submodules

ts_semantic_feature_detector.output_utils.writer module

Implements writing functionality to output data.

class ts_semantic_feature_detector.output_utils.writer.OutputWriter(odometry_file: str, points_file: str, times_file: str, separator: str = ',')[source]

Bases: object

Compiles data from the perception algorithm to be outputted.

odom_file

the path to the odometry data.

Type:

str

points_file

the path to the points data.

Type:

str

separator

the separator to be used in the output files.

Type:

str

Initializes the compiler.

Parameters:

  • odometry_file (str) – the path to the odometry data.

  • points_file (str) – the path to the points data.

  • separator (str, optional) – the separator to be used in the output files.

write_emerging_points(scene_id: int, scene: AgriculturalScene) → None[source]

Writes the emerging point to the points file.

Parameters:

  • scene_id (int) – the scene id.

  • scene (features_3d.scene.AgriculturalScene) – the scene containing the emerging points.

write_odometry_factors(scene_id: int, ekf_data: List) → None[source]

Writes the robot pose to the odometry file.

Parameters:

  • scene_id (int) – the scene id.

  • ekf_data (list) – the robot pose.

write_times(timer: Timer) → None[source]

Writes the times to the times file.

Parameters:

timer (perfomance.timer.Timer) – the timer object with the time measurements.
